level.text: This chapter shall apply to applicants for and holders of a license to practice registered nursing.
Chapters 40 (General Rules) and 41 (Administrative Procedures) of this title shall supplement this chapter.

level.heading: AUTHORITY
level.text: Unless otherwise noted, the authority for this chapter is ยง 302(14) of the District of Columbia Health Occupations Revision Act of 1985, D.C. Law 6-99, D.C. Code ยง 2-3303.2(14) (1988 Repl. Vol.), 33 DCR 729, 732 (February 7, 1986), and Mayor’s Order 86-110, 33 DCR 5220 (August 22, 1986).

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 36 DCR 622 (January 20, 1989); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 8613 (September 3, 2004).
